snippet: Mike Maccagnan fired five college scouts and the team’s longtime pro personnel director, Brandon Prophett.
abstract: New York Jets general manager Mike Maccagnan continues shakeup of team's scouting department, firing five college scouts and longtime pro personnel director Brandon Prophett.
lead_paragraph: Mike Maccagnan fired five college scouts and the team’s longtime pro personnel director, Brandon Prophett.

headline.main: Jets’ General Manager Continues to Reshape Scouting Department
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Football; Jets’ G.M. Fires Scouts
